Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum scored 26 of his 28 points in the first half
The Celtics went on a 19-4 run to close the second quarter
The Hawks were never within 19 points in the second half
Pre-Game Insights: The Celtics have won 16 straight when Jaylen Brown does not play
Post-Match Reflections: The Celtics are off to their best start since 2019-20, when they started 10-1
Jalen Johnson continues to take a step forward after a slow start to the season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics hit 18 3-pointers, including 15 in the first half, and outscored the Hawks 54-18 from behind the 3-point line
The Hawks entered the game allowing an NBA-worst 41.4% shooting from deep
Others: Trae Young left the game in the third quarter with a right rib strain
The Celtics lost both games in Atlanta last season, blowing a 30-point lead in one game and losing the other in overtime
